original_text:
Therefore a curse consumes the earth;
    its people must bear their guilt.
Therefore earth’s inhabitants are burned up,
    and very few are left.
korean_text: 그러므로 저주가 땅을 삼켰고 그 중에 사는 자들이 정죄함을 당하였고 땅의 주민이 불타서 남은 자가 적도다

sentences.original_text: Therefore a curse consumes the earth
its people must bear their guilt
sentences.korean_translation: 그 백성들은 자기들의 죄를 짊어져야 합니다

sentences.original_text: Therefore earth's inhabitants are burned up
